title: dlfx: Target trial emulation for ICU stress ulcer prophylaxis (PPI vs H2RA) using MIMIC-IV with eICU external validation
description: Reproducible analysis code and aggregated outputs for an observational ICU cohort study using target trial emulation (PPI vs H2RA) in MIMIC-IV with external validation in eICU-CRD. Patient-level data are not included; access requires PhysioNet credentialing and DUAs.

creators.name: Zheng, Hongwei
